name: Agriculture for life, life for agriculture
content: The University for Agronomic Sciences and Veterinary Medicine of Bucharest welcomes you to the 9th edition of its annual conference: Agriculture for Life, Life for Agriculture. The conference will take place between 4-6 June 2020 in Bucharest, Romania. We are proud to have welcomed for each of the previous editions more than 2000 authors from 45+ countries, with over 650 papers in 7 scientific sections, ranging from land science and agriculture to animal science, veterinary medicine, biotechnologies and management. Join us in Bucharest for this unique international experience! Abstract submission is open until 31.12.2019 and full paper submission until 01.03.2020\. See more details here: http://agricultureforlife.usamv.ro/images/ResourcesForAuthors/ConferenceFlyer\_Ed9\_2020\_A4L\_Announcement\_EN.pdf
organizers: University of Agricultural Sciences and Veterinary Medicine
